TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit JumpTask extends System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem

summary.span: 表示某应用程序在 Windows 7 任务栏跳转列表中的快捷方式。

span.span: Represents a shortcut to an application in the Windows 7 taskbar Jump List.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个可视为应用程序的快捷方式。A can be thought of as a shortcut to an application. 通过设置指定的可执行文件的路径属性。You specify the path to the executable file by setting the property. 如果未设置，则暗示当前正在运行的进程的路径。If the is not set, the path of the current running process is implied. 您可以选择指定要传递给在启动应用程序。You can optionally specify to pass to the application at startup. 你可以设置基本显示属性，如， ，和跳转列表中指定任务的外观。You can set basic display properties, such as , , and to specify the appearance of the task in the Jump List. 与一起使用的图标必须可用作本机资源。An icon used with a must be available as a native resource. 如果多个图标资源的 DLL 或可执行文件中，指定是要使用通过指示中的偏移量属性。If multiple icon resources are available in a DLL or executable file, you specify the one to use by indicating an offset in the property. 默认情况下将被放入**任务**跳转列表的类别。By default, a will be placed in the **Tasks** category of the Jump List. 可以通过设置指定的任务的自定义分组属性。You can specify custom grouping of tasks by setting the property. 通过创建来直观地分隔跳转列表中的项不具有和指定。You can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a that does not have a and specified. 此空将显示为一条水平线跳转列表中。This empty will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List. 在这种情况下，可以设置其他属性，但它们没有任何影响。In this case, other properties can be set, but they will not have any effect. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何声明标记中。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 将打开一个名为文本文件`readme.txt`记事本应用程序中。The opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#002](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#002)] 下面的示例演示如何配置在代码中。The following example shows how to configure a in code. 打开计算器应用程序。The opens the Calculator application. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#241](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#241)]

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to the application.
The path to the application.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性未指定，则为隐式端口当前正在运行的进程的路径。If the property is not specified, then the path of the current running process is implied. 应用程序可以包含非自身的可执行文件的任务。An application can contain tasks for executables other than itself. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何声明标记中。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 将打开一个名为文本文件`readme.txt`记事本应用程序中。The opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#002](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#002)] 下面的示例演示如何配置在代码中。The following example shows how to configure a in code. 打开计算器应用程序。The opens the Calculator application. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#241](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#241)]

summary.span: 获取或设置嵌入在资源中的图标的索引，索引从零开始。

span.span: Gets or sets the zero-based index of an icon embedded in a resource.

value.span: 图标的从零开始的索引；如果未使用图标，则为 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index of the icon, or -1 if no icon is used.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与一起使用的图标必须可用作本机资源。An icon used with a must be available as a native resource. 如果 DLL 或可执行文件中提供了多个图标，指定是要使用通过指示中的偏移量属性。If multiple icons are available in a DLL or executable file, you specify the one to use by indicating an offset in the property. 如果未不指定任何图标资源，或者如果找不到指定的图标，将显示标准系统图标。If no icon resource is specified, or if the specified icon is not found, the standard system icon is displayed. 若要指定将显示任何图标，设置属性设置为-1。To specify that no icon is displayed, set the property to -1. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何声明标记中。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 将打开一个名为文本文件`readme.txt`记事本应用程序中。The opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#002](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#002)]

span.span: Gets or sets the path to a resource that contains the icon to display in the Jump List.

value.span: 包含图标的资源的路径。

span.span: The path to a resource that contains the icon.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与一起使用的图标必须可用作本机资源。An icon used with a must be available as a native resource. 如果 DLL 或可执行文件中提供了多个图标，指定是要使用通过指示中的偏移量属性。If multiple icons are available in a DLL or executable file, you specify the one to use by indicating an offset in the property. 如果未不指定任何图标资源，或者如果找不到指定的图标，将显示标准系统图标。If no icon resource is specified, or if the specified icon is not found, the standard system icon is displayed. 若要指定将显示任何图标，设置属性设置为-1。To specify that no icon is displayed, set the property to -1. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何声明标记中。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 将打开一个名为文本文件`readme.txt`记事本应用程序中。The opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application. span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed for the task in the Jump List.

value.span: 针对跳转列表中的任务显示的文本。

span.span: The text displayed for the task in the Jump List.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，属性必须设置为才会出现在跳转列表作为可单击的任务。Typically, the property must be set for the to appear in the Jump List as a clickable task. 或者，你以可视方式可以通过创建分隔跳转列表中的项不具有和指定。Alternatively, you can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a that does not have a and specified. 此空将显示为一条水平线跳转列表中。This empty will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List. 在这种情况下，可以设置其他属性，但它们没有任何影响。In this case, other properties can be set, but they will not have any effect. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何声明标记中。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 打开文本文件名称`readme.txt`记事本应用程序中。The opens a text file name `readme.txt` in the Notepad application. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#002](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#002)] 下面的示例演示如何配置在代码中。The following example shows how to configure a in code. 打开计算器应用程序。The opens the Calculator application.
